titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Los Angeles Dodgers centennial press kit photographs V1991.004
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Patricia Glowinski
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2016-09-13T14:32-0400

did.unittitle: Los Angeles Dodgers centennial press kit photographs
did.abstract: The Los Angeles Dodgers centennial press kit photographs consist of two modern black-and-white photographic prints. One photograph is a group portrait of the 1890 Brooklyn Dodgers baseball team, while the other photograph consists of four panels showing views of four different baseball fields that were home to the Brooklyn Dodgers or the Los Angeles Dodgers. A view of Ebbets Field in Brooklyn is included. Though the photographic prints date from circa 1990, the original images from which the prints were reproduced date from circa 1890 to 1990.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Los Angeles Dodgers centennial press kit photographs consist of two modern black-and-white photographic prints. One photograph is a group portrait of the 1890 Brooklyn Dodgers baseball team, while the other photograph consists of four panels showing views of four different baseball fields that were home to the Brooklyn Dodgers or the Los Angeles Dodgers. A view of Ebbets Field in Brooklyn is included. Though the photographic prints date from circa 1990, the original images from which the prints were reproduced date from circa 1890 to 1990.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: The Brooklyn Historical Society holds additional manuscript and photograph collections related to the Brooklyn Dodgers. Please consult with library staff for more information.

processinfo.head: Processing Information note
processinfo.p: Fully processed to the item level.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids
otherfindaid.p: Item level description and digital versions of images from the collection are available for searching via the image database in the library. Please consult library staff for more information.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition for this collection are unknown. The collection was formally accessioned in 1991.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Reproduction rights for the photographs have not been evaluated. For information on securing rights to publish or reproduce, please see the Brooklyn Historical Society Reproduction Rights Policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Los Angeles Dodgers centennial press kit photographs, V1991.004, Box number, Object ID number; Brooklyn Historical Society.
